backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the cricket scoring backend with types for teams, players, matches, innings, deliveries, and tournament rules, plus stores and CRUD/game logic functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report identifying a single high-confidence feature task: fixing the LiveScoring.tsx scoring regression for all delivery types without reintroducing the EndOfOverModal loop.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source files to short summaries describing the purpose and recent changes of each component, page, hook, and utility in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes (colors, radius, chart, sidebar variables).
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA, mounting the app into a #root div and loading the Vite/TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all application routes and wraps the app in QueryClientProvider and a Layout shell.
frontend/src/components/BatsmanStatsPane: Displays batting stats cards for the current striker and non-striker, showing runs, balls, fours, sixes, and strike rate with visual differentiation for the striker.
frontend/src/components/BottomTabNavigat: Fixed bottom navigation bar with four tabs (History, Teams, Setup, Rules) using TanStack Router Links with active state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/BowlerStatsPanel: Displays the current bowler's stats (overs, runs, wickets, economy, maidens) in a card, resolving the bowler's name from the players list.
frontend/src/components/BulkPlayerUpload: A multi-step modal dialog for bulk-uploading players to a team via pasted text or file input, with validation (duplicates, length, spacing) and a preview/result flow.
frontend/src/components/ConfigureTournam: A modal dialog for viewing and updating tournament rules (overs, teams, penalties, etc.), fetching current rules from the backend and submitting changes via a form.
frontend/src/components/EndOfInningsModa: A modal dialog shown at the end of an innings that lets the user select the opening striker, non-striker, and bowler to set up the next innings.
frontend/src/components/EndOfOverModal.t: A modal dialog shown at the end of each over that prompts the user to select the next bowler, excluding the current bowler.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: The main app shell component that renders a sticky header with logo, bottom tab navigation, a footer, and a content area via React Router's Outlet or children.
frontend/src/components/OverTimeline.tsx: Displays a visual ball-by-ball timeline for the last three overs, color-coding each delivery by type (wicket, wide, no-ball, boundary, etc.).
frontend/src/components/PlayingElevenSel: A scrollable checklist component for selecting up to 11 players from a squad, with visual feedback for selected, disabled, and complete states.
Renders a styled error alert for query failures, detecting Internet Computer canister errors to show user-friendly messages and an optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/ResetAllDataModa: Confirmation dialog that warns the user about permanently deleting all tournament data (teams, matches, rules) and provides Cancel/Delete actions with a loading state.
frontend/src/components/ScoreDisplay.tsx: Displays the current cricket match score card including runs, wickets, overs, innings indicator, and target/required-runs info for the second innings.
frontend/src/components/WicketModal.tsx: Modal dialog for recording a wicket dismissal, allowing selection of dismissal type and the next incoming batsman before confirming the delivery.
frontend/src/data/cricketRules.ts: Static data file defining categorized cricket rules (Scoring, Extras, Dismissals, etc.) as structured objects with titles and descriptive content strings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) via React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, identity persistence, and login status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useMatchState.ts: A React hook that manages and persists cricket match state (striker, non-striker, bowler, innings, match result) to localStorage, exposing setters and helpers like swapBatsmen, startNextInnings, and endMatch.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating teams, players, and matches via the backend actor, including queries for getAllTeams, getMatch, and mutations for createMatch, addPlayer, and selectSquad.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, configures Tailwind CSS, and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark themes including navy and orange color palettes and cricket-specific utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/matchStore.ts: Provides localStorage-backed CRUD utilities for persisting match records, match metadata (teams, playing elevens, player IDs), and local match state, with BigInt serialization handling.
frontend/src/lib/matchUtils.ts: Utility functions for cricket scoring calculations including formatting overs, run rates, ball/wicket labels, and computing per-batsman and per-bowler statistics from ball-by-ball delivery records.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/LiveScoring.tsx: Main live scoring page that manages real-time cricket match state including deliveries, batsman/bowler stats, innings transitions, and modals for wickets and end-of-over events. Persists state locally and syncs with the backend via hooks.
frontend/src/pages/MatchHistory.tsx: Displays a list of stored matches from local storage with status badges, and provides options to refresh, reset all data, or start a new match.
frontend/src/pages/MatchSetup.tsx: Multi-step wizard for setting up a new cricket match, covering team selection, playing eleven selection, match rules configuration, and confirmation before navigating to live scoring.
frontend/src/pages/Rules.tsx: Displays standard cricket rules and tournament-specific rules in a tabbed accordion layout, with a modal to configure tournament rules.
frontend/src/pages/Scorecard.tsx: Shows a detailed post-match or in-progress scorecard with batting and bowling statistics for both innings, computed from delivery data fetched via query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/Teams.tsx: React page component for managing cricket teams, supporting listing, adding teams, adding individual players, and bulk player uploads via dialogs and modals.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts, CSS-variable-based color tokens (navy, orange, semantic colors), border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for a Cricket Scorer app, tracking version 3 with a known scoring regression bug in LiveScoring.tsx as the active fix request.
